Text:
Thank You!

great album. I looked for this album a couple years ago in vain.. the track "Gloomy Sunday" is definitely a track that stands out, with Adrian Belew doing the guitar work. 

thanks, can't wait to hear it again.
:) yeah i used to have the cassette many years ago and played it to death myself.. when i came across this.. i thought maybe others are like me and want it again... so here it is!.. :)
